DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to provide a detailed description of treatments for CRPC (Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer) patients with bone metastases and the resource utilization and costs associated with that diagnosis and subsequent treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Patterns in Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer Patients With Bone Metastases in a Medicare Population
DOC.criteria: First diagnosis for bone metastases for members diagnosed with prostate cancer found in the claims data during the identification period Members age ≥ 65 years at index Medicare members with medical and pharmacy coverage; and Continuously enrolled during the pre and postindex periods. Member with diagnosis of any other cancer (excluding melanoma (ICD9 172.x) and other metastases (ICD9 198.x)) before the index date; and Members age ≥ 89 years of age at index date
